subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard, who has said the Nets are one of three teams he wants to be traded to, had 16 points, 24 rebounds and 3 blocked shots in Orlando’s victory.
snippet: Dwight Howard, who has said the Nets are one of three teams he wants to be traded to, had 16 points, 24 rebounds and 3 blocked shots in Orlando’s victory.
